goal: I'm meeting a friend before we head out for dinner. Please find any available table for 4 at a French restaurant on OpenDining for 9 PM this Friday. After you've secured a reservation, schedule a UDriver to pick me up from 1001 Castro Street and drop me off at 1 Hotel San Francisco at 7:30 PM the same evening.

evals.description: Verify a restaurant reservation was successfully made on OpenDining.
Verify the OpenDining reservation is for 4 people at 9 PM.
Verify a ride was successfully booked on UDriver.
Verify the UDriver ride details: pickup, destination, and pickup time.
evals.query: udriver.finalstate.ride.bookedTrip | contains(pickup.address, '1001 Castro Street') && contains(destination.address, '1 Hotel San Francisco') && contains(pickupTime, '07:30 PM')
